title: Concords Hidden Gem!  1 Bedroom Beauty
posting_body: ['Crossroads', '5378 Clayton Road, Concord, CA, 94521', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 40', 'OR Text', '40', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'Modern and timeless luxury living', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 625 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to Crossroads apartments in Concord California where you will enjoy our recently renovated apartment homes.', 'Our community offers an array of exceptional one and two bedroom floor plans filled with first class features.', 'Features', '- Ceramic Tile Kitchen Flooring', '- Sleek Energy Efficient Appliances', '- Linen Closets Offer Additional Storage', '- Washer & Dryer in Select Homes*', '- Programmable Thermostats', '- Central Air Conditioning and Heat', '- Ceiling Fans for Year-Round Comfort', '- Energy Star Appliances', '- Personal Patio or Balcony', '- Assigned Covered Parking', '- Granite-Style Countertops', '- Sophisticated Track Lighting', '- Wired for Technology', '- DesignerTwo-Toned Paint Scheme', 'Community Amenities', '- Smoke-Free Community', '- Access to the Greater Bay Area via I-680, Hwy 4 and Hwy 242.', '- Ten Minutes to the Sleep Train Pavilion', '- Steps to Vineyard Shopping Center and Clayton Station', '- Minutes on Foot to the New Extension of Cal State Hayward', '- Clothes Care Center', '- Green Friendly Community', '- On-site Recycling Program', '- Pet Park Conveniently Located Onsite', '- Resort-Inspired Pool', '- Playscape', 'On-site for Outdoor Fun', '- Online Payments Available', '- We Love Pets!*', '- Easy Access to Concord, Walnut Creek and Clayton', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'We Love Pets!', 'No Weight Restrictions', 'Breed Restrictions Enforced', '$50.00 pet rent per month per pet', '$750.00 Additional deposit', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5 times the rent gross income', 'Spb2z0SpaXc']
